00361 template<class function>
00362         void C4DView::FunctionSlot<function>::createFunction(C4DView *view) {
00363 
00364         view->F.reset(new function (
00365             view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00366             view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00367             view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ()));
00368 
00369     SingletonLog::Instance() << "FunctionSlot<function>::createFunction(): "
00370             << view->F->getFunctionName().toStdString()
00371             << "(" << view->F->getParameterName(0).toStdString()
00372             << "," <<view->F->getParameterName(1).toStdString() <<","
00373             << view->F->getParameterName(2).toStdString() <<","
00374             << view->F->getParameterName(3).toStdString()<<")\n";
00375 
00376     view->menu->updateFunctionMenu (view->F->getFunctionName());
00377     view->AssignValues (view->F);
00378     view->Redraw ();
00379 }
00380 
00382 
00386 template<class function>
00387         void C4DView::FunctionSlot<function>::createSurface(C4DView *view) {
00388 
00389     view->F.reset(new function (
00390              view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00391              view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du ()));
00392 
00393     try {
00394         view->menu->updateFunctionMenu (view->F->getFunctionName());
00395     } catch (QString error) {
00396         QMessageBox::information (NULL, "Error", error);
00397 
00398     }
00399     view->AssignValues (view->F);
00400 
00401     view->Redraw ();
00402 }

00417 template<class function>
00418         void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot<function>::createCustomFunction(
00419                  C4DView *view) {
00420             function *tmp = new function (
00421                 view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00422                 view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00423                 view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ());
00424             if (tmp->isValid()) {
00425                     view->F.reset(tmp);
00426                     QString sym (((function *)(view->F).get ())->symbolic());
00427 
00428                 view->AssignValues(view->F);
00429                 view->Redraw ();
00430             } else {
00431                 delete tmp;
00432                 view->UpdateStatus("Failed to load custom function");
00433             }
00434         }
00435 
00437 
00442 template<class function>
00443     void C4DView::CustomFunctionSlot<function>::createCustomSurface(
00444                 C4DView *view) {
00445         function *tmp = new function (
00446             view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00447             view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du ());
00448         if (tmp->isValid()) {
00449             view->F.reset(tmp);
00450             QString sym (((function *)(view->F).get ())->symbolic());
00451 
00452             view->AssignValues(view->F);
00453             view->Redraw ();
00454         } else {
00455             delete tmp;
00456             view->UpdateStatus("Failed to load custom function");
00457         }
00458     }

00463 template<class function>
00464     Function *C4DView::TemplatedFunctionFactory<function>::createFunction(
00465         C4DView *view) {
00466         return new function (
00467             view->Values->tmin (), view->Values->tmax (), view->Values->dt (),
00468             view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00469             view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ());
00470     }
00471 
00473 
00475 template<class function>
00476     Surface *C4DView::TemplatedSurfaceFactory<function>::createSurface(
00477         C4DView *view) {
00478         return new function (
00479             view->Values->umin (), view->Values->umax (), view->Values->du (),
00480             view->Values->vmin (), view->Values->vmax (), view->Values->dv ());
00481     }
